standard.description: These are general tests with no theme-specific angle

test.query_clob:
select case when aapr.region_source like '%YYYY%'
            then 'N'
            else 'Y'
            end pass_yn,
       aapr.workspace,
       aapr.application_id, 
       aapr.page_id,
       null created_by,
       null created_on,
       aapr.last_updated_by,
       aapr.last_updated_on,
       apex_string.format('Region `%0` (app %1, page %2) is using a hard-coded date formats: `%3`', 
        p0 => aapr.region_name, 
        p1 => aapr.application_id,
        p2 => aapr.page_id,
        p3 => substr(aapr.region_source,1,30)) validation_failure_message,
       apex_string.format('Region `%0` (app %1, page %2) is using hard-coded date formats', 
        p0 => aapr.region_name, 
        p1 => aapr.application_id,
        p2 => aapr.page_id) issue_title,
       aapr.region_id component_id,
       aapr.parent_region_id parent_component_id,
       aapr.region_name,
       aapr.template,
       aapr.display_position,
       aapr.source_type,
       aapr.component_template_options,
       aapr.report_template
from apex_application_page_regions aapr
inner join apex_application_pages aap on aap.page_id = aapr.page_id
                                      and aap.application_id = aapr.application_id
left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo1 on  aabo1.build_option_name = aap.build_option
                                                     and aabo1.application_id = aap.application_id
left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo2 on  aabo2.build_option_name = aapr.build_option
                                                     and aabo2.application_id = aapr.application_id
where aapr.workspace = svt_preferences.get('SVT_WORKSPACE')
and coalesce(aabo1.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
and coalesce(aabo2.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
and aapr.query_type_code = 'SQL'

test.test_name: Region Static IDs can have underscores not dashes
test.query_clob:
select case when lower(aapr.static_id) like '%-%'
            then 'N'
            else 'Y'
            end pass_yn,
       aapr.workspace,
       aapr.application_id, 
       aapr.page_id,
       null created_by,
       null created_on,
       aapr.last_updated_by,
       aapr.last_updated_on,
       apex_string.format('Region static id `%3` (app %1, page %2) should replace dashes with underscores', 
        p0 => aapr.region_name, 
        p1 => aapr.application_id,
        p2 => aapr.page_id,
        p3 => aapr.static_id) validation_failure_message,
       apex_string.format('Region static id `%3` cannot have dashes (app %1, page %2, region name `%0`, region id %4)', 
        p0 => aapr.region_name, 
        p1 => aapr.application_id,
        p2 => aapr.page_id,
        p3 => aapr.static_id,
				p4 => aapr.region_id) issue_title,
       aapr.region_id component_id,
       null parent_component_id,
       aapr.region_name,
       aapr.template,
       aapr.display_position,
       aapr.source_type,
       aapr.component_template_options,
       aapr.report_template,
       aapr.static_id
from apex_application_page_regions aapr
inner join apex_applications aa on aapr.application_id = aa.application_id
inner join apex_application_pages aap on aap.page_id = aapr.page_id
                                      and aap.application_id = aapr.application_id
left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo1 on  aabo1.build_option_name = aap.build_option
                                                     and aabo1.application_id = aap.application_id
left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo2 on  aabo2.build_option_name = aapr.build_option
                                                     and aabo2.application_id = aapr.application_id
where aapr.workspace = svt_preferences.get('SVT_WORKSPACE')
and coalesce(aabo1.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
and coalesce(aabo2.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
and aapr.static_id is not null
test.explanation: Region static ids cannot have dashes

test.test_name: Use the appropriate page item subtype
test.query_clob:
select case when (   lower(aapi.label) like 'email%'
                  or lower(aapi.label) like 'e-mail%')
            then case when aapi.attribute_04 = 'EMAIL'
                      then 'Y'
                      else 'N'
                      end
            when (   lower(aapi.label) like 'phone%'
                  or lower(aapi.label) like 'mobile%'
                  or lower(aapi.label) like 'cell%') 
            then case when aapi.attribute_04 = 'TEL'
                      then 'Y'
                      else 'N'
                      end
            when (   lower(aapi.label) like 'search%') 
            then case when aapi.attribute_04 = 'SEARCH'
                      then 'Y'
                      else 'N'
                      end
            when (   lower(aapi.label) like '%url%'
                  or lower(aapi.label) like 'website%') 
            then case when aapi.attribute_04 = 'URL'
                      then 'Y'
                      else 'N'
                      end
            end pass_yn, 
       aapi.label,
       aapi.attribute_04,
       aapi.workspace,
       aapi.application_id, 
       aapi.page_id,
       null created_by,
       null created_on,
       aapi.last_updated_by,
       aapi.last_updated_on,
       apex_string.format('Page Item `%0`/`%3` (app %1, page %2) is using the wrong subtype : `%4`', 
        p0 => aapi.item_name, 
        p1 => aapi.application_id,
        p2 => aapi.page_id,
        p3 => aapi.label,
        p4 => aapi.attribute_04) validation_failure_message,
       apex_string.format('Page Item `%0`/`%3` (app %1, page %2) is using the wrong subtype', 
        p0 => aapi.item_name, 
        p1 => aapi.application_id,
        p2 => aapi.page_id,
        p3 => aapi.label,
        p4 => aapi.attribute_04) issue_title,
       aapi.item_id component_id,
       aapi.region_id parent_component_id,
       aapi.item_name,
       aapi.item_help_text,
       aapi.display_as,
       aapi.display_as_code
from apex_application_page_items aapi
inner join apex_application_pages aap on aap.page_id = aapi.page_id
                                      and aap.application_id = aapi.application_id
left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo1 on  aabo1.build_option_name = aap.build_option
                                                     and aabo1.application_id = aap.application_id
left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo2 on  aabo2.build_option_name = aapi.build_option
                                                     and aabo2.application_id = aapi.application_id
where aapi.workspace = svt_preferences.get('SVT_WORKSPACE')
and coalesce(aabo1.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
and coalesce(aabo2.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
and aapi.display_as_code = 'NATIVE_TEXT_FIELD'
test.explanation: Page items labelled 'Email','Search','URL','Phone Number' (or a similar variant) should use the appropriate subtype.

test.test_name: Form Elements may benefit from help text
test.query_clob:
with pproc as (select application_id, page_id, count(1) proc_count
                from apex_application_page_proc
                group by application_id, page_id),
     api as (select case when lower(api.label) in ('username','password')
                         then 'Y'
						             when api.item_help_text is null 
                         then case when api.display_as = 'Checkbox' 
                                   and api.item_label_template in ('Label Top')
                                   then 'Y'
                                   else 'N'
                                   end
                         else 'Y'
                         end pass_yn,
                    api.application_id,
                    api.page_id,
                    api.last_updated_by,
                    api.last_updated_on,
                    api.item_id component_id,
                    api.item_name,
                    api.item_source_type,
                    api.item_help_text,
                    api.display_as,
                    aap.build_option,
                    abo.build_option_status,
                    abo.status_on_export,
                    api.item_label_template,
                    api.label,
                    api.workspace,
                    pproc.proc_count
            from apex_application_page_items api
            inner join apex_application_pages aap on  api.application_id = aap.application_id
                                                  and api.page_id = aap.page_id
            inner join pproc on  pproc.application_id = api.application_id
                             and pproc.page_id = api.page_id
            left outer join apex_application_build_options abo on  aap.application_id = abo.application_id
                                                               and aap.build_option = abo.build_option_name 
            left outer join apex_application_build_options abo2 on  api.application_id = abo2.application_id
                                                                and api.build_option = abo2.build_option_name 
            where api.workspace = svt_preferences.get('SVT_WORKSPACE')
            and api.display_as not in ('Hidden')
            and coalesce(abo.status_on_export,'NA') not in ('Exclude')
            and coalesce(abo2.status_on_export,'NA') not in ('Exclude')
            )
select api.pass_yn,
       api.application_id,
       api.page_id,
       null created_by,
       null created_on,
       api.last_updated_by,
       api.last_updated_on,
       case when api.pass_yn = 'N'
            then apex_string.format('Item `%0` (page %1, app %2, displayed as `%3`) is missing Help Text. Form items require Help Text.',
                          p0 => api.item_name,
                          p1 => api.page_id,
                          p2 => api.application_id,
                          p3 => api.display_as) 
            end validation_failure_message,
       case when api.pass_yn = 'N'
            then apex_string.format('Item `%0` (page %1, app %2) is missing Help Text',
                          p0 => api.item_name,
                          p1 => api.page_id,
                          p2 => api.application_id) 
            end issue_title,
       api.component_id,
       api.item_name,
       api.display_as,
       null parent_component_id,
       api.item_help_text,
       api.item_source_type,
       api.item_label_template,
       api.label,
       api.workspace,
       api.proc_count
from api
test.explanation:
All editable form elements should have help text.Â This test is tied to the following WCAG Codes :

1.  3.3.2(A) : Labels or Instructions:  
    Labels or instructions are provided when content requires user input.
    
2.  1.3.5(AA) : Identify Input Purpose:
    
    The purpose of each input field collecting information about the user can be programmatically determined when:
    
    The input field serves a purpose identified in the Input Purposes for User Interface Components section; and  
    The content is implemented using technologies with support for identifying the expected meaning for form input data.
    
3.  3.3.5(AAA) : Help : Context-sensitive help is available.
